channel.title: Football on Renzo Cammi Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Football on Renzo Cammi Portfolio

item.title: xG by Game
item.description: Expected goals by game for each team played in the league. You have the option to color the plot by xG difference or by away/home team. Repo was made public so people can make their own vizualizations. You just have to follow the instructions! Link to Github Repository
